mapper.sql: Id, Summary, `Order`, IsPublished, PublishDate, CreatedOn, RecordStatus
mapper.select:
select
,
from BulletinBoard where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and RecordStatus = 0

select
,
from BulletinBoard where RecordStatus = 0 order by `Order` desc

select
,
from BulletinBoard where RecordStatus = 0 and IsPublished = 1 order by `Order` desc, PublishDate desc
